items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t want to spend the rest of his career in middle management.

Since you\'re going to Tom\'s house anyway, could you give this to Tom?

When was the last time you celebrated Christmas with your whole family?

I want to study with the same French teacher that Tom is studying with.
